Text1: Hoe, dink jy, is die pikkewyn aangepas om in water te swem?
Text1 Translation: How do you think the penguin is adapted to swim in water?
Text2: Hoe, dink jy, stoor dit water vir lang tydperke?
Text2 Translation: How do you think it stores water for long periods of time?

Text1: Indien moontlik, vra ons vir donasies uit die gemeenskap om by te dra tot n suksesvolle fondsinsamelingsprojek.
Text1 Translation: If possible, we ask for donations from the community to contribute to a successful fundraising project.
Text2: Indien die gemeenskap vir ons van enige donasies kan voorsien, sal dit opreg waardeer word.
Text2 Translation: If the community can provide us with any donations, it would be greatly appreciated.

Text1: Jy ry die eerste hoepel antikloksgewys tot by n vurk in die pad.
Text1 Translation: You drive the first hoop anti-clockwise until you reach a fork in the road.
Text2: Internet is die ander tegnologie wat dit moontlik maak om jou besigheid op n bekostigbare manier te bemark.
Text2 Translation: Internet is the other technology that makes it possible to market your business in an affordable way.

Text1: Vettel veg uitstekend terug om steeds vyfde te eindig, maar dis n groot knou vir sy kampioenskap-droom.
Text1 Translation: Vettel fights back excellently to still finish fifth, but it's a big blow to his championship dream.
Text2: Ons ry tot bo-op die hoë duin, en kon van bo af die soutwerke mooi sien.
Text2 Translation: We drove up to the top of the high dune, and could see the saltworks from above.

Text1: Ek het n kruisie gemaak dat jy my kan sien, waar ek by die venster uitloer.
Text1 Translation: I made a cross so that you can see me, where I look out of the window.
Text2: As ek nie n kruisie gemaak het nie, sal jy nie eens geweet het dis ek nie.
Text2 Translation: If I didn't make a cross, you wouldn't even know it was me.

Text1: Die WR het 74.5% van die subjekte korrek geklasifiseer met 'n sensitiwiteit van 93%.
Text1 Translation: The WR correctly classified 74.5% of the subjects with a sensitivity of 93%.
Text2: Dit het 74.5% van die subjekte korrek geklassifiseer met 'n sensitiwiteit van 69%.
Text2 Translation: It correctly classified 74.5% of the subjects with a sensitivity of 69%.

Text1: Indien jy n verf met n oplosmiddel-basis gebruik het, sal verfstroper goed werk.
Text1 Translation: If you used a solvent-based paint, paint stripper will work well.
Text2: Wend n onderlaag aan  Plascon se Tile & Melamine Primer werk baie goed.
Text2 Translation: Apply a primer to Plascon's Tile & Melamine Primer works very well.

Text1: Vishuis sal ook n erfenissentrum wees.
Text1 Translation: Vishuis will also be a heritage centre.
Text2: Wanneer Vishuis voltooi is, kan dit n brug wees in die gemeenskap.
Text2 Translation: When Vishuis is completed, it can be a bridge in the community.

Text1: Die rand het in Desember teenoor sowel die dollar as die euro versterk.
Text1 Translation: The rand strengthened against both the dollar and the euro in December.
Text2: Einde Desember het die rand teen onderskeidelik R12,37 en R14,82 teenoor die dollar en euro verhandel.
Text2 Translation: At the end of December, the rand traded at R12.37 and R14.82 respectively against the dollar and the euro.

Text1: Die komma kan vir nadruk gebruik word om woorde of frases van die res van die sin te skei.
Text1 Translation: The comma can be used for emphasis to separate words or phrases from the rest of the sentence.
Text2: Die komma word nie ná die aanhef en groet in 'n brief of e-pos gebruik nie.
Text2 Translation: The comma is not used after the salutation and salutation in a letter or e-mail.

Text1: Pak n laag komkommerlinte op die rys.
Text1 Translation: Put a layer of cucumber ribbons on the rice.
Text2: Pak n ry biltong, avokado en soetrissie oor die lengte van die rys en rol styf op.
Text2 Translation: Pack a row of biltong, avocado and sweet pepper along the length of the rice and roll up tightly.

Text1: Bykomende inligting oor die toekennings is beskikbaar hier afgelaai word.
Text1 Translation: Additional information about the awards is available here.
Text2: Bykomende inligting oor NAB Wys New York is hier afgelaai word.
Text2 Translation: Additional information about NAB Show New York can be downloaded here.

Text1: Ons maklike resepte is ook aflaaibaar in gidse wat jy kan uitdruk en in jou kombuis kan hou.
Text1 Translation: Our easy recipes are also downloadable in guides that you can print out and keep in your kitchen.
Text2: So kan jy dan ook die maklike resepte wat op Ontbytsake gedeel word op rekenaar of selfs kompakskyf hou.
Text2 Translation: So you can also keep the easy recipes shared on Breakfast Matters on your computer or even on a compact disc.

Text1: Gemaak deur 'n betroubare maatskappy, bied hierdie produk vitamien K1 as fyllokinoon.
Text1 Translation: Made by a reputable company, this product offers vitamin K1 as phylloquinone.
Text2: Hierdie produk word vervaardig deur 'n bekende betroubare handelsmerk; maar dit is baie duurder as sommige alternatiewe.
Text2 Translation: This product is manufactured by a well-known and trusted brand; but it is much more expensive than some alternatives.

Text1: Die doel van die vervreemding van die grond was die oprigting van die nuwe hoë hof vir Mpumalanga.
Text1 Translation: The purpose of the alienation of the land was the establishment of the new high court for Mpumalanga.
Text2: Die munisipaliteit moes gevolglik n ander stuk grond aankoop vir die oprigting van die nuwe hoë hof.
Text2 Translation: Consequently, the municipality had to purchase another piece of land for the construction of the new high court.

Text1: Oranjeroete (5 km)  lekker vir gesinne wat hulle tegniese vaardighede wil toets.
Text1 Translation: Orange route (5 km) fun for families who want to test their technical skills.
Text2: Geelroete (30 km)  geskik vir die meeste bergfietsryers.
Text2 Translation: Yellow route (30 km) suitable for most mountain bikers.

Text1: Neem n afvalstukkie kroonlys en merk waar dit die muur en die plafon ontmoet.
Text1 Translation: Take a scrap piece of cornice and mark where it meets the wall and the ceiling.
Text2: Posisioneer die lys waar die muur en plafon ontmoet en hou vas tot die gom droog is.
Text2 Translation: Position the molding where the wall and ceiling meet and hold until the glue dries.

Text1: Skaap sleep die bruin dwarshoute oor die swaar stompe.
Text1 Translation: Sheep drags the brown timbers over the heavy logs.
Text2: Skaap en bewer kap die dwarshoute vas aan die swaar stompe met lang spykers.
Text2 Translation: Sheep and beaver cut the cross-timbers to the heavy logs with long nails.

Text1: Tans is dit die enigste verklarende Afrikaanse woordeboek wat op n selfoon beskikbaar is.
Text1 Translation: Currently, it is the only explanatory Afrikaans dictionary that is available on a mobile phone.
Text2: Dit is as n CD en n aanlynweergawe (ook op n selfoon) beskikbaar.
Text2 Translation: It is available as a CD and an online version (also on a mobile phone).

Text1: Sy werk by n privaat kleuterskool en woon in Durbanville.
Text1 Translation: She works at a private nursery school and lives in Durbanville.
Text2: Pak n laag lasagne-velle bo-op en herhaal tot jy vier lae het.
Text2 Translation: Place a layer of lasagna sheets on top and repeat until you have four layers.
